ValidationRule.description: Restricts Group Plan Sponsors for Optum United Healthcare
ValidationRule.errorConditionFormula:
AND( ISPICKVAL(ClientName__c, "Optum - United HealthCare"),
OR(Group_PlanSponsor__c <> "AMERICAN EXPRESS COMPANY"),
Group_PlanSponsor__c <> "SCHLAGE LOCK COMPANY LLC DBA ALLEGION",
Group_PlanSponsor__c <> "PERFORMANCE FOOD GROUP",
Group_PlanSponsor__c <> "SPROUTS FARMERS MARKET, LLC",
Group_PlanSponsor__c <> "BASS PRO GROUP, LLC",
Group_PlanSponsor__c <> "PETSMART",
Group_PlanSponsor__c <> "TARGET CORPORATION",
Group_PlanSponsor__c <> "METLIFE",
Group_PlanSponsor__c <> "CENTURYLINK",
Group_PlanSponsor__c <> "OPTUM360 SERVICES, INC.",
Group_PlanSponsor__c <> "UNITEDHEALTH GROUP",
Group_PlanSponsor__c <> "LEGENDS HOSPITALITY, LLC"
)
ValidationRule.errorMessage: Group/Plan Sponsor must match an ASO value in the United Plan Sponsor Crosswalk.
